categories: Category:Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows

nodes.text: Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows 1
Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows 1 is the first issue of five in the Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows comic mini-series written by Tim Siedell. It was released on December 18, 2013.

During the Clone Wars, a single trooper—left for dead during battle—comes to hate the Jedi generals who abandoned him. Years later, he lives on, bitter and angry, until hearing tales of a great warrior. Now, this clone believes he may have found the leader he should have been following all along… Darth Vader!
